Chapter 12: Bestowing Predictions. At that time, after the World-Honored One had spoken this verse, the great assembly of the universal light attained the forbearance of the non-arising of dharmas. The Bodhisattva Precious Light was then bestowed with a prediction.

He will be called the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, the One of Perfect Understanding, the One of Perfect Accomplishment, the Well-Gone One, the Knower of the World, the Unsurpassed One, the Tamer of Men, the Teacher of Gods and Men, the Buddha, the World-Honored One.
At that time, there will be sentient beings.
Purely of the Great Vehicle.
No more Shravakas or Pratyekabuddhas.
The name of the country will be Pure Adornment.
Surpassing Amitabha by a hundred thousand myriads of times.
After bestowing predictions on the bodhisattvas,
He will then wish to abandon his seat.
Chapter 13: Transmission and Upholding At that time, Manjushri Bodhisattva addressed the Buddha, saying:
World-Honored One,
In whose hands will these future people be?
By what causes and conditions will they be able to hear this sutra?
The Buddha said:
Good man,
This sutra is extremely profound and difficult to hear.
It is like a vajra that ordinary people cannot see,
Except for Indra.
This sutra is also like this.
The sravakas and pratyekabuddhas are unable to see it,
Except for the bodhisattvas, who are like lions.
All birds and beasts dare not face it.
Only the dragon king is an exception.
This sutra is also like this.
Sravakas and pratyekabuddhas cut off their hopes.
Only bodhisattvas are an exception.
If someone were to fill the four continents with pure gold and use it as alms,
It would not be as good as hearing the name of this sutra and obtaining ten thousand times the blessings.
If someone were to make a bed and table out of the seven treasures,
And offer crystal robes to sentient beings,
Filling the realm of Jambudvipa,
It would not be as good as hearing the name of this sutra and obtaining ten thousand times the blessings for an eon.
If there are good men and good women,
Who hear this sutra,
You should know,
This person has attended countless buddhas,
And planted various roots of virtue.
Only then can they hear it.
Good men,
This sutra will come into the hands of bodhisattvas on the eighth ground in the future.
